title: John Mayer Guitar Case
content:
Hello,

I was wondering if anyone could help me find a typeface that looks like this one, it doesn't have to be a stencil, I can always edit it.

Thanks.

ab.

author: andy_ab11

comments.content: Avant Garde. Add the Stencil gaps.

wow, I should have known, since I use Avant Garde for everything!

Thanks.

Avant Garde for everything - repent! Shudder.

YW :)  
Andreas
